caption.text:
Tip of the day ✅⁣
⁣
Get enough sleep every night if you can 😴 adults should aim for 7 to 9 hours of sleep per night. ⁣
⁣
Sleeping is essential to increase our stress tolerance, decrease mode changes and irritability, plus it helps build up our immune system 🙌🏼 (all so important right now!) ⁣
⁣
I’ve been having trouble falling asleep because of stress, but making sure I have a consistent bedtime every night has been helping lots. I am not staying up late watching the news anymore and I have been putting away my phone and all screens 30 minutes before I go to sleep. ⁣
⁣
Some other things that can help if you are having trouble falling asleep are taking a warm bath before bed, meditating for 5-10 minutes to help calm your mind, doing yoga or stretching before bed. ⁣
⁣
Have you been having enough hours of sleep at night?! What do you do to help if you have trouble falling asleep? ⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣⁣
#reallife #tipoftheday #psa #momlife #momtruths #sleep #bedinspo #modernhome #canadianinfluencer #canadianblogger #momblogger #lifestyleblogger #homedesign #vancouver #cityliving #bedroomideas #modernbedroom #whitebedroom #airy #bright #decor #bedroomdecor #bedroominspon #bedroomdesign #modernroomdecor ⁣#modernbedroomdesign

posts.accessibility_caption: Photo by Angela van Tijn in Vancouver, British Columbia with @onesmileymonkey.

caption.text:
Confidence: “a feeling of self-assurance arising from one's appreciation of one's own abilities or qualities”⁣⁣
⁣⁣
It has taken me 34 years but I can say that I am more confident now than I have ever been in my entire life.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Nowadays I am all about how I feel and how I spend my time with those I love, and I am worrying less about what people think about me 🤷🏻‍♀️⁣
⁣⁣
I try to work out and stay active everyday, I eat what I want to eat, while trying to maintain a healthy balance, and I do it all for myself.  I’m so grateful to be alive and to have a body that allowed me to grow and give birth to two beautiful humans. I also want to stick around for a long time to spend it with them if that’s in my destiny! ❤️⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Self-love and self-care are heavily entertwined. Finding the balance that works for you feels amazing though! 💜 So forget about what others think and focus on yourself, your balance and what works for YOU 💕⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
#selflove #loveyourself #selfcare #confidence #mombody #momlife #selfie #bodyacceptance #reallife #ootd #momuniform #nomakeup #naturallook #airybathroom #modernhome #modernbathroom #vancouver #yvr #interiordesign #designinspo #bathroominspo #bodyconfidencemovement #bodyconfidence #balance

posts.accessibility_caption: Photo by Angela van Tijn in Vancouver, British Columbia with @onesmileymonkey.

caption.text:
See that look? Yup, that’s the “let’s go for a walk, mom” look I get from my puppy. 🐶 ⁣
⁣
Every day she comes and sits there, just outside my office, and just watches me while I work. 👀⁣
⁣
🏠 Working from home means I don’t have set schedules, but it also means sometimes I forget about taking breaks and when I am focusing on something I can spend hours sitting at my desk.⁣
⁣
Enter my pup. 🐕 Thanks to this girl I have multiple breaks during the day. I get to go outside and take her for walks and I get to spend time playing with her. 🏀 ⁣
⁣
I have found two great benefits so far. Physically because I am walking and exercising more everyday 💪🏼 , and mentally because I take mental breaks away from work too, those are so needed to avoid feeling burnt out.🏃‍♀️⁣
⁣
If you work from home. How do you make sure you get the breaks you need during the day? Do you set schedules? ⏰ ⁣
⁣
If you work in an office, do you take all your breaks or do you end up missing some when you are in the middle of something important? 🤔⁣ I am now really focusing on my mental and body health first, because I will produce better work if I am happy and healthy first!
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣⁣

caption.text:
You guys, I still can’t believe I had the chance to visit the Facebook/Instagram offices in Vancouver this morning to chat with a team of researchers from Instagram ❤️ ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
It was such an amazing opportunity. Not only to visit their offices, which by the way are unbelievable and I want to work there now 🙋🏻‍♀️... but also to chat all about content creation and how Instagram can improve to help us get to YOU and share what we do organically! ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Such a great chat! Loved being able to share my thoughts and concerns and having a team there listening and open to discussion! ❤️⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
From how accounts that buy fake likes affects us all, to the hashtag game, algorithm changes and how they affect us, and getting our content seen by more people! ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Grateful for opportunities like this. Also, I got to sign THE Facebook Wall too!! 😆 ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
O.k. Pinch me now! 🙌🏻⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
#influencer #yvr #vancouver #facebook #instagram #facebookwall #blogger #momblogger #parenting #grateful #opportunities #instagramoffices #vancouvermom #vancouverblogger #algorithms

Longtime Fresh Prep customer, busy mom of 3 (two boys, and a fur baby 🐶) Angela of @onesmileymonkey has seen firsthand how Fresh Prep has been able to expose her family to new recipes and flavours. Admittedly, Angela knows “we are not very adventurous eaters and we often end up stuck in a rut when it comes to dinners, making the same meals week after week. Having a meal delivery prep service like Fresh Prep means we get to experiment a bit more with different flavours and ideas for things we would not particularly choose to cook ourselves.” Don’t just take our word for it...check out weekly rotating menu with 10 recipes each week! 🍽️ ⁣
⁣
📸: @onesmileymonkey
